name: Cell: To Cell and Back: The Making of the Film
detailed_description: Director Tod Williams, John Cusack, Samuel L. Jackson and the team behind CELL take the viewer behind the scenes and into the process of creating epic action, producing frightening visual effects, and bringing the film to life.
about_the_game: Director Tod Williams, John Cusack, Samuel L. Jackson and the team behind CELL take the viewer behind the scenes and into the process of creating epic action, producing frightening visual effects, and bringing the film to life.
short_description: Director Tod Williams, John Cusack, Samuel L. Jackson and the team behind CELL take the viewer behind the scenes and into the process of creating epic action, producing frightening visual effects, and bringing the film to life.
